item.title: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas - Twelve Drums Celebrating
item.description: Celebrating Success: The 12th Day of Azure Arc-Mas On the twelfth day of Arc-mas, our Azure journey culminates in a grand celebration of achievements. item.title: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas - Eleven Logs a-Streaming
item.description: Day 11: Eleven Logs a-Streaming - Azure Arc’s Unified Monitoring and Insights Azure Monitored Me: Eleven Logs a-Streaming On the eleventh day of Arc-mas, we delve into the streams of logs and the symphony of insights that Azure Arc conducts across all environments. Like pipers piping a harmonious tune, Azure Arc orchestrates a continuous flow of telemetry data, ensuring a comprehensive view of your applications’ health and performance. Insights Across All Environments Azure Arc shines its beacon across containerized applications, virtual machines, and hyper-converged infrastructure (HCI), illuminating the landscape with Container Insights, VM Insights, and HCI Insights.

item.title: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas - Ten Clouds Connecting
item.description: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas: Day 10 - Ten Clouds Connecting On the tenth day of Azure Arc-Mas, Azure bridged for me: Ten Clouds Connecting, crafting a tapestry of seamless cloud integration. item.title: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas - Nine Devs a Dancing
item.description: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas: Day 9 - Nine Devs a-Dancing On the ninth day of Azure Arc-Mas, Azure eased for me: Nine Devs a-Dancing, with one-click deployments enhancing their crafting. item.title: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas - Six Apps Deploying

item.title: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas - Five Golden Savings
item.description: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas: Day 5 - Five Golden Savings On the fifth day of Azure Arc-Mas, Azure saved for me: Five Golden Savings, bringing hybrid benefits that make fiscal sense truly engraving. item.title: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas - Three Services Scaling
item.description: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas: Day 3 - Three Services Scaling On the third day of Azure Arc-Mas, Azure gifted me: Three Services Scaling, with Azure SQL and PostgreSQL providing no downtime feeling. item.title: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas - Two Clusters Flexing
item.description: The 12 Days of Azure Arc-Mas: Day 2 - Two Cluster Flexing On the second day of Azure Arc-Mas, Azure sent to me: Two Clusters Flexing, managed from Azure, yet running so free. Azure Arc’s Key Messages: Consistent Development and Operations: Azure Arc fosters uniform development and operations of cloud-native applications across any Kubernetes environment.
